LanguageData.Disc_ExcludeStartingScenario: Exclude everything spawned from starting scenario
LanguageData.Disc_ExcludeStartingXenotypes: Exclude starting pawn xenotypes from discovery
LanguageData.Disc_ExcludeStartingAnimals: Exclude starting colony animals from discovery
LanguageData.Disc_SaveToClient: Save discoveries to client instead of save file
LanguageData.Disc_ResetSaveFile: Reset all discoveries on this save file
LanguageData.Disc_ResetClient: Reset all discoveries saved to client
